forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 44F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
